mapper.insert: insert into TICKET(ticket_num, movie_id, cust_number, movie_name, theater_id, movie_date, start_time, end_time, theater_seat) values(TICKET_SEQ.nextval, #{movie_id},#{cust_number}, #{movie_name}, #{theater_id}, #{movie_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{theater_seat})
